definition: Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: Small forest Liang Shan area is located in traverse mountain chain east side.
sentences.chinese: 小涼山地區地處橫斷山脈東側。

sentences.english: Vivid fuchsias bloom in China's Hengduan Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 鮮豔的晚櫻花盛開在中國的橫斷山脈。

sentences.english: Parts of the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and the Hengduan Mountains extend to its territory.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原和橫斷山脈的一部分延伸到了阿壩境內。

sentences.english: The Mountain Hengduan, the distributioned centre for East-Asiatic Porellaceae (Hepaticae).
sentences.chinese: 橫斷山脈東亞光萼苔科植物的分佈中心。
